title: Thereâ€™s Still a Limit to How Much In-Person Socializing Many Can Handle
sub_head: Despite a widespread desire to get back to normal, social bandwidth is lower for many than it was pre-pandemic, mental-health professionals say
body:
Some Americans moved past worrying about the worst of the pandemic months ago and started embracing more in-person dates, happy hours and a return to the office. Others just started to do all of this recently.
Both groups are finding themselves out of social shape.
